ComicInfo.Summary: Death Pool 2: Sara battles and defeats Shine on the subway. Irons and Dr. Tabisch test Tora No Shi's power by pitting him against one of Level 42's deadliest subjects. Sara has a drink with Lee Kim that gets interrupted by the appearance of Nottingham.
